items.title: Fix VDB Replica Configuration in Dify ðŸš€
items.summary: This update addresses the VDB replica configuration issue by setting the replica count to zero for Tencent VectorDB serverless instances. Key files modified include the environment configuration and deployment YAMLs for both the API and worker components. This change ensures proper functionality and stability in the deployment environment.

items.title: Clean Up Footer by Removing ICP Number in Roadmap ðŸš€
items.summary: This update removes the Chinese ICP registration number from the website footer as requested. Key changes include making secondary footer elements optional and adding conditional rendering logic to ensure only valid links are displayed. The footer now solely showcases the copyright text, streamlining the user interface.

items.title: Enhanced version limits for deployments in Dify ðŸš€
items.summary: This update modifies the revision history limit across multiple deployment configurations for Dify, increasing it from 1 to 10. This change enhances the ability to manage deployment history and rollbacks, improving overall stability and performance. All relevant documentation has been updated accordingly.
